Just received an email from my ISP that the copyright holder, Exquisite Multimedia Inc., is suing for infringement.  Settlement is $200.00.  Copyrightsettlements.com?  Should I take this seriously, or should everyone else heed the warning so they don't end up in my position?
It's a fake.  There can't be both a superman and a superwoman.

@voraxith:  sadly enough I hadn't even thought of that!  nothing came of it.  to be sued for copyright infringement you have to be served by federal court, not by email from the entity threatening you.
just wanted to let others know the game this movie company is playing.
